_description: Example ESG configuration for generating economic scenarios

_schema.esg_model: string (vasicek | cir) - Interest rate model type
_schema.outer_paths: int (3-10) - Number of outer skeleton paths
_schema.inner_paths_per_outer: int (100-10000) - Monte Carlo paths per outer path
_schema.projection_years: int (1-100) - Number of years to project
_schema.assumptions_version: string - Version of yield curve assumptions from AM (e.g., 'v2.1', 'latest')
